data.title: Stephen Dunham Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Stephen Dunham on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Stephen Dunham including Paranormal Activity 4.

Telling Amanda

Ryan overhears Amanda's boyfriend making other plans for lunch so he, Lulu and True decide to follow him only to discover he's cheating on her.Â True decides it's best to tell Amanda, which only makes her give True more work.

The Reject Room

True is stunned to find some of her designs in Mad Styleâs Reject Room of bad ideas, and takes out her anger on Max. True, Lulu, and Ryan help Amanda get revenge on an artist ex-boyfriend by inadvertently destroying his exhibit.
